Subskills.name: Roaring Thunder
Subskills.description: Increases lightning damage dealt by thunder fury.

Subskills.name: Breaking Thunder
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Arc Lightning
Subskills.description: Thunder bolts unleash an arc of additional bolts behind the target on hit.

Subskills.name: Photonic Transfer
Subskills.description: Recover a portion of your life on hit.

Subskills.name: Thunderstep
Subskills.description: Decreases movement speed diminish when using thunder fury.

Subskills.name: Tectonic Hit
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Electric Essence
Subskills.description: Inflict lightning break and stasis to targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Storm's Wisdom
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased damage based on your intelligence.

Subskills.name: Tectonic Impact
Subskills.description: Stunned targets unleash an exploding lightning pulse on hit.

Subskills.name: Thunder's Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the range of thunder fury.

Subskills.name: Leaping Thunder
Subskills.description: Release chain lightning on hit with an increased number of bounces.

Subskills.name: Vacuuming Thunder
Subskills.description: Thunder bolts pull targets to the initial point of impact followed by a surge of lightning dealing area of effect damage.
